description: Updates a Voice Connector's termination settings.

parameters.name: Termination
parameters.description: The termination settings to be updated. CpsLimit (integer) --- The limit on calls per second. Max value based on account service quota. Default value of 1. DefaultPhoneNumber (string) --- The default outbound calling number. CallingRegions (list) --- The countries to which calls are allowed, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format. Required. (string) --- CidrAllowedList (list) --- The IP addresses allowed to make calls, in CIDR format. (string) --- Disabled (boolean) --- When termination is disabled, outbound calls cannot be made.

nested_params.name: CpsLimit
nested_params.description: The limit on calls per second. Max value based on account service quota. Default value of 1.

nested_params.name: CallingRegions
nested_params.description: The countries to which calls are allowed, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format. Required.

nested_params.name: CidrAllowedList
nested_params.description: The IP addresses allowed to make calls, in CIDR format.

nested_params.name: Disabled
nested_params.description: When termination is disabled, outbound calls cannot be made.
